items.label: 58d18eb45457a35c40d557f0
items.name: Residential Electric Service (Rate 711)
items.description:
Available for Residential Service to qualified Residential single-family homes and farm Customers
if service to the single-family home is separately metered. The Customer's service must be located
on the Company's Distribution Lines suitable and adequate for supplying the service requested.
Service is subject to the conditions set forth in this Rate Schedule and the Company Rules.
items.energycomments: Adjustments = Fuel Cost charge + Regional Transmission Organization factor + Environmental Cost Recovery mechanism + Environmental Expense Recovery mechanism + Resource Adequacy Adjustment factor + Demand Side Management Adjustment factor + Green Power Rider rate + Federally Mandated Cost Adjustment factor + Transmission, Distribution, and Storage System Improvement charge
